TopicTitle: Map item (lil capsule icon from map view) in every screen, why?

Articles.Content:
I had a craft on launch pad, loaded auto-saved craft to runway.  Lil map icon showing capsule now shows up in live craft view, in editor, and basically everywhere but the initial menu screens.  Initially i had massive fps issues till i went to tracking station & "recovered" the craft.  Icon still remained.  What's going on here???

 

1.2.1 64 bit win 7 amd cpu/gpu.  

 

- Andy
I assume by now you've exited the game and gone back in, and that fixed it. However if for some reason you have not, your log files would possibly be of great use to the developers in a bug report.

I will take a look.

 

- Andy
